description: A special pot for growing plants, maintaining them at comfortable conditions for maximum yield.  It can be crafted with various seeds to plant them.
A garden pot growing some tasty, unnameable plants.  You shouldn't see this item.
A garden pot with some ripe, unnameable plants.  You shouldn't see this item.
This is a garden pot growing tomatoes.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare them for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The tomatoes aren't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The tomatoes are ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot with a ripe tomato plant.  Disassemble to retrieve the tasty 'matos.
This is a garden pot growing wheat.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The wheat isn't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The wheat is ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot with wheat ready to harvest.  Disassemble to retrieve it.
This is a garden pot growing hops.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The hops aren't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The hops are ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing blooming hops flowers.  Disassemble to harvest them.
This is a garden pot growing buckwheat.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The buckwheat isn't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The buckwheat is ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing ripe buckwheat stalks.  Disassemble to harvest them.
This is a garden pot growing broccoli.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The broccoli isn't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The broccoli is ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing some fully-grown broccoli.  Disassemble to harvest it.
This is a garden pot growing oats.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The oats aren't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The oats are ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing some golden, fully-grown oats.  Disassemble to harvest them.
This is a garden pot growing barley.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The barley isn't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The barley is ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing some ready-to-harvest barley.  Disassemble to harvest it.
This is a garden pot growing carrots.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The carrots aren't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The carrots are ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing some ripe carrots.  Disassemble to harvest them.  Store away from rabbits.
This is a garden pot growing cotton.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cotton isn't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The cotton is ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing white, fluffy cotton bolls ready for the loom.  Disassemble to pluck them.
This is a garden pot growing cabbage.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cabbage isn't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The cabbages are ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing a big cabbage leaf.  Disassemble to harvest it.
This is a garden pot growing cucumber.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cucumber isn't done growing yet.
use_action.msg: The cucumber is ready to harvest!

description: This is a garden pot containing ripe cucumber.  Disassemble to harvest it.
This is a garden pot growing garlic bulbs.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The garlic isn't done growing yet.

description: This is a garden pot containing pungent garlic bulbs.  Disassemble to harvest them, or wave it at vampires to scare them.
